channel.title: Surfskate Location Guide by Denise
channel.description: Recent content on Surfskate Location Guide by Denise

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Denise Nepraunig and I started skateboarding and surfskating at 36 years old in August 2021. I am from Austria and currently live in Berlin. I enjoy cruising around on my surfskate in bowls and on pumptracks. I love the flowy feeling of surfskates and I don’t use them as surftrainers because I can’t surf. As far as my skatebording abilities go, I’m still working on my ollie and it will be a long way until my first kickflip.

item.title: Camacrew Skatepark Berlin Buch - Germany
item.description: The skatepark in Berlin Buch is brand new and has a bowl and a street section. The bowl has coping all around. The whole area is quite nice as is surounded by greenery and trees. The street section has a half bowl which is not as high as the bowl itself, so you can practice some drop-ins there. A bit further up is a smaller quarter which is also good to practice some drop-ins.
